entry.dcterms:description: access to jurisdiction, equal chances of different social strata in civil jurisdiction, role of legal representation, time and expenses related to civil lawcases, deprived and privileged contesting parties
entry.dcterms:subject: equality and inequality
law, crime and legal systems
law enforcement
elections
social stratification and groupings
document
administrative records
cross-section
Randomly selected 1.5% sample of civil lawcases launched in 1984 and became legally binding by 1986, at 15 courts of justice.
Data collection based on the analysis of judicial case records.
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
entry.dcterms:subject: The "N" value of KOVOSSZ = prosecution claim is 9999 All the values of J = allowance, temporary service start with 800000 which should be deducted from real value (e.g.800,90=900HUF). "H" value of ITI0OLD IT20OLD=19.
